summary: When a mysterious groupie joins legendary cursed band, "The Dark Knights", a series of unexplained murders derails their comeback tour.
cast: Taryn Manning|Hal Ozsan|Eric Roberts|Betsy Rue|Danny Arroyo|Mitch Ryan|Michael Teh|Maja Miletich|Nikki Moore|Bevin Prince|Kassie Spielman|Caia Coley|Dita de Leon|Gwendolyn Edwards|Scott Anthony Leet|Tino Struckmann|Pej Vahdat|Cherilyn Wilson|Tia Barr|April Montgomery
title: Groupie
